23 struct RotateDegress
24  : SmaccState<RotateDegress, RadialMotionStateMachine, mpl::list<NavigationOrthogonalLine, ToolOrthogonalLine>> // <- these are the orthogonal lines of this State
25 {
26  // when this state is finished then move to the NavigateToEndPoint state
27  typedef sc::transition<EvActionResult<smacc::SmaccMoveBaseActionClient::Result>, NavigateToEndPoint::NavigateToEndPoint> reactions;
28 
29 public:
30 
31  using SmaccState::SmaccState;
32 
33  void onEntry()
34  {
35  ROS_INFO("-------");
36  ROS_INFO("Entering in ROTATE TEN DEGREES STATE");
37  }
38 
39  // This is the state destructor. This code will be executed when the
40  // workflow exits from this state (that is according to statechart the moment when this object is destroyed)
41  void onExit()
42  {
43  ROS_INFO("Exiting in ROTATE TEN DEGREES STATE");
44  }
45 };

49 struct NavigationOrthogonalLine
50  : SmaccState<NavigationOrthogonalLine, RotateDegress::orthogonal<0>,
51  Navigate>
52 {
53 public:

55 
56  void onEntry()
57  {
58  }

60 //------------------------------------------------------------------
61 // this is the navigate substate inside the navigation orthogonal line of the RotateDegreess State
62 struct Navigate : SmaccState<Navigate, NavigationOrthogonalLine>
63 {
64 public:
65 
66  using SmaccState::SmaccState;
67 
68  void onEntry()
69  {
70  ROS_INFO("Entering Navigate");
71 
72  // this substate will need access to the "MoveBase" resource or plugin. In this line
73  // you get the reference to this resource
74  this->requiresComponent(moveBaseClient_ , ros::NodeHandle("move_base"));
75 
76  this->requiresComponent(odomTracker_ );
77 
78  this->requiresComponent(plannerSwitcher_ , ros::NodeHandle("move_base"));
79 
80  // read parameters from ros parameter server
81  readParameters();
82 
83  int i;
84  if (!this->getGlobalSMData("angle_index", i))
85  {
86  // this is the first radial motion (influences to the initial angle)
87  i = initial_orientation_index_;
88  }
89  else
90  {
91  i += 1; // this is not the first time, increment the degress with 10 degreess
92  }
93 
94  ROS_INFO("Trajectory %d/%d", i , linear_trajectories_count_);
95 
96  // check if the motion is in the latest straight motion
97  if(i == linear_trajectories_count_)
98  {
99  ROS_WARN("STOP ROTATING. TERMINAL STATE OF THE STATE MACHINE");
100  terminate();
101  }
102  else
103  {
104  // sets from the state machine i "global variable" to know the current orientation
105  ROS_INFO("[RotateDegrees/Navigate] Radial angle index: %d", i);
106  this->setGlobalSMData("angle_index", i);
107 
108  // get the angle according to the angle index
109  yaw = i * angles::from_degrees(angle_increment_degree_);
110  this->setGlobalSMData("current_yaw", yaw);
111  ROS_INFO_STREAM("[RotateDegrees/Navigate] current yaw: " << yaw);
112 
113  this->odomTracker_->clearPath();
114 
115  ros::spinOnce();
116  this->plannerSwitcher_->setForwardPlanner();
117  this->odomTracker_->setWorkingMode(smacc_odom_tracker::WorkingMode::RECORD_PATH_FORWARD);
118 
119  rotateDegrees();
120  }
121  }
122 
123  // reads parameters from the ros parameter server
124  void readParameters()
125  {
126  this->param("initial_orientation_index", initial_orientation_index_, 0);
127  this->param("angle_increment_degree", angle_increment_degree_, 90.0);
128  this->param("linear_trajectories_count", linear_trajectories_count_, 4);
129 
130  ROS_INFO_STREAM("initial_orientation_index:" << initial_orientation_index_);
131  ROS_INFO_STREAM("angle_increment_degree:" << angle_increment_degree_);
132  ROS_INFO_STREAM("linear_trajectories_count:" << linear_trajectories_count_);
133  }
134 
135  // auxiliar function that defines the motion that is requested to the move_base action server
136  void rotateDegrees()
137  {
138  ROS_INFO("Rotate degree MoveBase Call");
139  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped radialStart;
140  this->getGlobalSMData("radial_start_pose", radialStart);
141 
142  smacc::SmaccMoveBaseActionClient::Goal goal;
143  goal.target_pose = radialStart;
144  goal.target_pose.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
145 
146  goal.target_pose.pose.orientation = tf::createQuaternionMsgFromRollPitchYaw(0, 0, yaw);
147  moveBaseClient_->sendGoal(goal);
148  }
149 
150  void onExit()
151  {
152  ROS_INFO("Exiting move goal Action Client");
153  }
154 
155 private:
156  // keeps the reference to the move_base resorce or plugin (to connect to the move_base action server).
157  // this resource can be used from any method in this state
158  smacc::SmaccMoveBaseActionClient *moveBaseClient_;
159 
160  smacc_odom_tracker::OdomTracker* odomTracker_;
161 
162  smacc_planner_switcher::PlannerSwitcher* plannerSwitcher_;
163 
164  // the initial index of the linear motion (factor of angle_increment_degrees)
165  // value specified in parameters server
166  int initial_orientation_index_;
167 
168  // the increment of angle between to linear motions
169  // value specified in parameters server
170  double angle_increment_degree_;
171 
172  // value specified in parameters server
173  int linear_trajectories_count_;
174 
175  // the angle of the current radial motion
176  double yaw;
177 };
178
